name: Double Edged Sword
rules:
Equip 3
Whenever equipped creature deals damage to a creature, up to three target artifact creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn
All attacking or blocking creatures get +3/+0
At the beginning of your end step, target opponent may pay 1. If that player does, flip ~this~.
Discard a instant card: target player loses 1 life
flavor:
--The best sofa made of iron sprints
– Foucault, the great
rules2:
Whenever you are dealt damage, ~this~ deals 4 damage to each creature 
1, T: up to three target attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn

name: any background but pink
rules:
1, Pay 4 life, T, sacrifice ~this~: search your library for a land card and put it into hand, then shuffle your library
When the number of creatures on the battlefield is 3 or more, flip ~this~.
rules2: Whenever ~this~ is tapped for mana, untap target permanent

name: colorless
rules:
~this~ enters the battlefield tapped.
T: add 3 to your mana pool
If an opponent would lose life, instead add that many black mana to your mana pool.

name: red or green
rules:
~this~ enters the battlefield tapped.
4WW, Sacrifice ~this~, T: add R to your mana pool for each card in your graveyard
1UU, T, sacrifice ~this~: search your library for a Island card and put it into the battlefield, then shuffle your library
T: add G to your mana pool

name: red
rules:
T: add 1 to your mana pool
GG, T: add 1R to your mana pool

name: black
rules:
T: add 1 to your mana pool
GG, T: add 1B to your mana pool

name: Servant to the Guardian
rules: T: target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn

name: Servant to the Guardian
rules: T: target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn

name: Servant to the Guardian
rules: T: target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn

name: Hellish Cube
rules:
Equip 3(R/G)(R/G)(R/G)
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, target player may pay X, where X is the number of basic land types among lands an opponent controls. If that player doesn't, put two +1/+1 counters on target tapped white creature and that creature can't be blocked except by Myr until end of turn
Whenever equipped creature blocks, flip ~this~.
rules2:
Equip 3G 
Pay 1 life: clash with an opponent. If you win, tap target white enchantment and that permanent gains ''3: you gain 1 life for each poison counter an opponent has and ~this~ gains protection from sorcery spells until end of turn'' until end of turn 
Whenever equipped creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, target tapped Gargoyle is a artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn

name: Flames of Brighthearth
rules: 2: copy target activated ability and you may choose new targets for the copy
flavor:
--Even one rock made of steel kills the flower yet embiggens even the mightiest throne
– Gideon

rules:
all Druids get +2/+2 until end of turn
Scry 2
rules2: All Spirits are black 4: ~this~ deals 3 damage to target creature or player

name: Academy Scholar
rules:
When you control no Mountains, flip ~this~.
Sacrifice ~this~, Tap an untapped Plains you control: return any number of target Wizards to their owner's hand
flavor:
--Her action competes more impressively than even the wisest team
– Unattributed
rules2:
2, Pay 4 life: counter target spell or ability Sacrifice a creature: exchange control of target tapped land you control and target permanent of the same type target opponent controls 
Pay 3 life: up to three target Wizards get -2/-0 until end of turn

name: Sedatore Voritho
rules:
+1: target Wizard gains ''1R: ~this~ deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target players. Creatures damaged this way can't be regenerated this turn'' until end of turn and that creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn
-1: ~this~ deals 1 damage to target player with 2 or more poison counters for each basic land type on the battlefield
-5: put five +1/+1 counter on target Gnome
